about_the_game: ​Embark on an exhilarating journey through the cosmos with the free demo of Interstellar Sentinel, a mind-blowing sci-fi fantasy shoot'em up that pays homage to the classics like Salamander and R-Type. It's as if Einhander and DeathSmiles had a baby delivered by Dr. R-Type! As you battle demonic entities and face epic boss battles, immerse yourself in the thrill of flow state gaming, where your skills evolve on the path to achieving the coveted S+ tier rank. Experience the game change as your skills improve! We challenge you to not only conquer the game but to dominate it with style. Post your highest scores and showcase your mastery, and let the world know that you've become the ultimate cosmic savior. The call to action is clear: attain the S+ tier rank, post your high score, and etch your initials into the hall of fame. Do you have what it takes to be the hero the universe deserves? The challenge awaits – unleash your inner hero now!​
